// Automatically generated by declarative-routing, do NOT edit
import { z } from "zod";
import { makeGetRoute, makeRoute } from "./makeRoute";

const defaultInfo = {
  search: z.object({}),
};

import * as HomeRoute from "@/app/page.info";
import * as PokemonSearchAPIRoute from "@/app/api/pokemon/route.info";
import * as ApiPokemonPokemonIdRoute from "@/app/api/pokemon/[pokemonId]/route.info";
import * as PokemonDetailRoute from "@/app/pokemon/[pokemonId]/page.info";
import * as SearchRoute from "@/app/search/page.info";
import * as TanstackRoute from "@/app/tanstack/page.info";

export const Home = makeRoute("/", {
  ...defaultInfo,
  ...HomeRoute.Route,
});
export const PokemonDetail = makeRoute("/pokemon/[pokemonId]", {
  ...defaultInfo,
  ...PokemonDetailRoute.Route,
});
export const Search = makeRoute("/search", {
  ...defaultInfo,
  ...SearchRoute.Route,
});
export const Tanstack = makeRoute("/tanstack", {
  ...defaultInfo,
  ...TanstackRoute.Route,
});

export const getPokemonSearchAPI = makeGetRoute(
  "/api/pokemon",
  {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...PokemonSearchAPIRoute.Route,
  },
  PokemonSearchAPIRoute.GET
);
export const getApiPokemonPokemonId = makeGetRoute(
  "/api/pokemon/[pokemonId]",
  {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...ApiPokemonPokemonIdRoute.Route,
  },
  ApiPokemonPokemonIdRoute.GET
);

//
//
// CUSTOM R OBJECT
export const R = {
  Home: makeRoute("/", {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...HomeRoute.Route,
  }),
  PokemonDetail: makeRoute("/pokemon/[pokemonId]", {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...PokemonDetailRoute.Route,
  }),
  Search: makeRoute("/search", {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...SearchRoute.Route,
  }),
  Tanstack: makeRoute("/tanstack", {
    ...defaultInfo,
    ...TanstackRoute.Route,
  }),
  api: {
    getPokemonSearchAPI: makeGetRoute(
      "/api/pokemon",
      {
        ...defaultInfo,
        ...PokemonSearchAPIRoute.Route,
      },
      PokemonSearchAPIRoute.GET
    ),
    getApiPokemonPokemonId: makeGetRoute(
      "/api/pokemon/[pokemonId]",
      {
        ...defaultInfo,
        ...ApiPokemonPokemonIdRoute.Route,
      },
      ApiPokemonPokemonIdRoute.GET
    ),
  },
} as const;
